name: SetPrimaryLanguageForSitePage
description:
Set a site page as the primary language of its group.

This tool is used to designate a site page as the primary language page in a multi-language group within HubSpot CMS. It should be called when a user needs to configure language settings for site pages.

parameters.name: page_id_to_set_primary
parameters.description: The ID of the site page to set as the primary language in the multi-language group.

value_schema.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.

value_schema.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
